\name{Steal.Savvy}
\alias{Steal.Savvy}
\title{Steal.Savvy}
\usage{
Steal.Savvy <- (PLAYER_NAME, STL_x)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{STL_X}{Steals per game of the player}
}
\description{
Rate a players ability to generate steals
}
\examples{
Steal.Savvy("Lebron James", 2)
}
